clauses.appointment: The Employer appoints the Employee to perform duties as assigned from time to time.
clauses.compensation: The Employee shall be paid a fixed monthly salary subject to applicable deductions.
clauses.working_hours: The Employee shall work standard business hours unless otherwise required.
clauses.confidentiality: The Employee shall maintain strict confidentiality of all proprietary information.
clauses.termination: Either party may terminate this agreement by providing 30 days written notice.
clauses.governing_law: This agreement shall be governed by the laws of India.
